short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto exchange translator, help user translate into Krean and Japenese from English.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A translator tool for Crypto Exchange of Huobi/OKX/Binance into Korean and Japanese.
It will translate content automatically and realtime into selected language according to the English contents.
